Package com.microsoft.rest.v3

Class SwaggerMethodParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.rest.v3.SwaggerMethodParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpResponseDecodeData
    public class SwaggerMethodParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements HttpResponseDecodeData
    The type to parse details of a specific Swagger REST API call from a provided Swagger interface method.

    • Method Summary

      Get the type of body Object that a thrown RestException will contain if the HTTP response's status code is not one of the expected status codes.

      • expectedStatusCodes

        public int[] expectedStatusCodes()
        Get the HTTP response status codes that are expected when a request is sent out for this Swagger method. If the returned int[] is null, then all status codes less than 400 are allowed.
        Specified by:
        expectedStatusCodes in interface HttpResponseDecodeData
        Returns:
        the expected HTTP response status codes for this Swagger method or null if all status codes less than 400 are allowed.

      • isExpectedResponseStatusCode

        public boolean isExpectedResponseStatusCode​(int responseStatusCode)
        Get whether or not the provided response status code is one of the expected status codes for this Swagger method.
        Parameters:
        responseStatusCode - the status code that was returned in the HTTP response.
        Returns:
        whether or not the provided response status code is one of the expected status codes for this Swagger method.

      • isExpectedResponseStatusCode

        public boolean isExpectedResponseStatusCode​(int responseStatusCode,
                                            int[] additionalAllowedStatusCodes)
        Get whether or not the provided response status code is one of the expected status codes for this Swagger method.
        Parameters:
        responseStatusCode - the status code that was returned in the HTTP response
        additionalAllowedStatusCodes - an additional set of allowed status codes that will be merged with the existing set of allowed status codes for this query
        Returns:
        whether or not the provided response status code is one of the expected status codes for this Swagger method

      • returnValueWireType

        public java.lang.reflect.Type returnValueWireType()
        Get the type that the return value will be send across the network as. If returnValueWireType is not null, then the raw HTTP response body will need to parsed to this type and then converted to the actual returnType.
        Specified by:
        returnValueWireType in interface HttpResponseDecodeData
        Returns:
        the type that the raw HTTP response body will be sent as

        public boolean expectsResponseBody()
        Checks whether or not the Swagger method expects the response to contain a body.
        Returns:
        true if Swagger method expects the response to contain a body, false otherwise
